definition: to be mistreated/to be bullied
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
(fig.) punching bag
to suffer bullying and beating (idiom)
(idiom) to have a bad experience as a customer/to encounter poor service

sentences.english: Third category called" little wife" middle, be a yes-man, like a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 第三類叫“小媳婦型”中層，唯唯諾諾，像個受氣包。

sentences.english: She's a doormat in the company, even the green hand can wrong her.
sentences.chinese: 她在公司就是個受氣包，甚至新手也可以欺負她。

sentences.english: Even I bought everything Shouqi , I stupid ah.
sentences.chinese: 就連我買東西都受氣，我傻啊。

sentences.english: Speak out what you want to say, don't just like a doormat!
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是一個受氣包，什麼都不敢反抗。

sentences.english: Are victims suffer indignities hiding in the room, comfort and channel is d. rosy clouds come in.
sentences.chinese: 正婷受氣躲在房裏，彩霞進來安慰並開導正婷。

sentences.english: So in the units we not only became jack, also become a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 所以在單位我們不但成了千斤頂，還成了受氣包。

sentences.english: Even if their part was to have been a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 即使是他們的錯誤就在於一直在當受氣包。

sentences.english: Shes born doormat, afraid of going against anything.
sentences.chinese: 她天生就是個受氣包兒，什麼事都不敢說個不字。

sentences.english: Lest my bewailed guilt should do thee shame.
sentences.chinese: 以免你因我的悲罪蒙羞受氣。

sentences.english: The second was the female victim, great weakness and complete lack of physical tonus.
sentences.chinese: 第二個原型是受氣的女人，導致她的肌肉軟弱無力。

sentences.english: Hydration process belongs to diffusion control with exothermic reaction.
sentences.chinese: 由於水合過程受氣液擴散控制，並且是放熱反應。

sentences.english: Every time there was a fight in the playground, he seemed to end up as the punchbag.
sentences.chinese: 每次操場上有人打架，最終他就好像成了受氣包。

sentences.english: You are a real punching bag before her.
sentences.chinese: 在她面前，你是個十足的受氣包。

sentences.english: You are plain doormat. Why couldn't you say "NO"?
sentences.chinese: 你真是個受氣包兒。你怎麼就不能說個“不”字呢？

sentences.english: After suffering injustice for several years, today he has finally received understanding from the people around him.
sentences.chinese: 幾年來他一直負屈受氣，今天終於得到周圍人的理解。

definition: to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
to bear grudges
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
to enumerate sb's shortcomings/to criticize/to scold/to talk on and on
to move aside/to get out of the way/to back down/to concede
to take one's anger out on sb (who does not deserve it)
to be secretly delighted
to agree (to do sth)/to promise
to stir up trouble/to invite disaster
to fall short of/to have a deficit/deficit/deficiency
bad luck/unlucky/calamitous/wretched
to support one's family (idiom); to have difficulty feeding a family
to get angry
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
not knowing which course to follow (idiom); at a loss what to do
